Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes terms of members of the board of the New York state thruway authority
Summary: Establishes terms of members of the board of the thruway authority; staggers terms; provides for termination upon inauguration of a new governor unless reappointed.
LawCode: Amd ยง352, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the terms of the members of the board of the New York state thruway authority
